_header: Men owe honour ever among / The cross that all our hele on hung
Title(s): ‘De Inuencione sancte crucis’; Northern Homily Cycle
_description: ‘De Inuencione sancte crucis’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: MEn aw to honure euer omangþe cros þat al our hele on hang…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat we nay to þat blis be broghtWhilk crist with his blode us boght

Morris,  Richard,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Holy Rood, Symbols of the Passion, and
                Cross-Poems.
